preqs: MGX5985 or MGX9850 or seek Chief Examiner's approval before undertaking this unit

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGF5985, MGX5985, MGX9850} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {MAN5261, MBA5017, MBA5220, MBA5220A, MBA5220B, MGF5260, MGF5261, MGX5260, MGX5261}

description: The unit considers emerging technological, social, economic, political and legal changes having implications for the successful management of people within the Australian context. Topics covered will alter as current issues change. Representative issues include implications of social, technological and demographic changes for HRM; philosophical orientations and ethics in HRM; the role of HRM in the strategy, development, implementation, and use of emerging technologies; alternative delivery models for HRM activities; workplace violence and bullying.
